> norm.sum.crit.ds1 <- norm.sum.crit.ds[-c(11,12,13,14)]
> quanDs <- c(0.25,0.5,0.75,0.9,0.95)
> quanDs
[1] 0.25 0.50 0.75 0.90 0.95
> earlyiterdsup <- numeric(length(quanDs))
> for(i in 1:length(quanDs)){
+   earlyiterdsup[i] <- which(norm.sum.crit.ds1 >= max(norm.sum.crit.ds1)*quanDs[i])[1]
+ }
> earlyiterdsup
[1]  1  7 16 42 74
